basis: The user verbally commits to a simple logging routine and hydration reminders, but has historically shown limited consistent execution despite repeated plans. Given the recent emphasis on small steps and contingencies (reminders, flexibility), a mid-low action value around 2.5 is reasonable. Using the formula (S - action) / S with S = 4.14 yields compliance â‰ˆ 0.40.
coaching_notes: Acknowledge the plan while strengthening accountability. Encourage ultra-fast micro-commitments (e.g., 1-line log immediately after dinner) and automatic prompts (phone reminders, calendar alerts). Explore barriers (tiredness, BED symptoms) and set up non-judgmental check-ins to bolster adherence. Reinforce progress tracking and celebrate small wins to build momentum.
